law.catch_line: The Secretary of State may seek an immediate injunction against any violation of this title....

text.section: The Secretary of State may seek an immediate injunction against any violation of this title.

A person who violates an injunction issued under this section:
is in criminal contempt; and
is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $250 or imprisonment not exceeding 30 days or both.
